wizardBean.property: Remove this bean for STAF 3.0 GA release

IMPORTANT NOTICE! This Beta version of STAF 3.0 is provided as a preview of features that will be available in STAF 3.0. This Beta is not intended to be used in production environments, and it is not supported in production environments.
STAF already installed at specified location
An existing version of STAF is already installed at $P(absoluteInstallLocation). Please uninstall the existing version and restart this installation program.

arrayItem.property: The program will be installed with the absolute minimum files necessary to run STAF .

wizardBean.property: Setup will add program icons to the Program Folder listed below. You may type a new folder name or use the default folder name. Click Next to continue.
Setup has enough information to start copying the program files. If you want to review or change any setting, click Back. If you are satisfied with the settings, click Next to begin copying files.

Setup Type: $W(setupTypes.selectedSetupTypeId)
Target Directory: $P(absoluteInstallLocation)
The following components will be installed:
$W(stafSelectedComponents.selectedComponents) Options:
$W(stafOptions.optionsSummary)

Now that you have installed STAF, we recommend that you read the "Getting Started with STAF" document. This document's location is $P(absoluteInstallLocation)$J(file.separator)docs$J(file.separator)STAFGS.pdf

arrayItem.property: Use the console launcher instead of the normal launcher so that silent installations won't return until the installation completes
Use the console launcher instead of the normal launcher so that silent installations won't return until the installation completes
